ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters

Class CurlyBracesCryptFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters.CurlyBracesCryptFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptFormatter<CryptParts>

    public class CurlyBracesCryptFormatter
extends Object
implements CryptFormatter<CryptParts>
    Crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash. The encoding can be "HEX" (hexa) or "b64" (base64), set as the variant "withEncoding".
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.Hashers.MD5, CurlyBracesCryptFormat.Hashers.SHA

      • parse

        public CryptParts parse(String crypt,
                        Hasher hr)
        Description copied from interface: CryptFormatter
        Breakdown a crypt to its parts. Parsers can parse a partial crypt, in order for example to extract the salt.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface CryptFormatter<CryptParts>
        Parameters:
        crypt - The crypt string to parse.
        hr - The hasher that can process the crypt ; also hold the configuration such as the byte encoder.
        Returns:
        The crypt parts of the given crypt.
